or will the game only work with both discs?

You can play with just the first disc.  Second disc is only to install if you want all of the extra cars and such.  Awesome to have, but not necessary at all :) What I'd suggest is to burn both so you have all the extras if you do eventually pick up a hard drive (which I REALLY REALLY suggest)  You can get an adapter for the hard drive port that lets you use any size/physical size hdd you want.
